oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rube & Sarah - Request program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio request program featuring father and daughter duo Rube & Sarah. Circa late 1940s. Orthotone Recorders label with address 517 Spreckels Building, Zone 1, San Diego, CA.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Rube & Sarah
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Rube and Sarah talk -- The Covered Wagon Rolled Right Along (Rube & Sarah) -- Rube and Sarah talk -- Farther Along (Rube & Sarah) -- Rube and Sarah talk -- Pins And Needles (In My Heart) (Rube & Sarah) -- Rube and Sarah talk -- Crawdad Song (Rube & Sarah)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rube and Sarah (Musical group)
